Alba Spa at royal rose Abu Dhabi welcomes world renowned beauty specialist
The newly open Alba Spa recently welcomed Mrs. Margy Lombard for its official opening ceremony, attended by Abu Dhabi socialites, beauty aficionados as well as media representatives.Mrs. Lombard, founder of Margy’s of Monte Carlo, skin care was visiting Abu Dhabi to exclusively launch her line of products and treatments at Alba Spa.
The 5-star Spa is the latest beauty addition in Abu Dhabi and offers the best in face and body treatments. World-renowned brands share the menu to offer modern women, a perfect solution to flawless skin and toned body. It covers exclusive facials by Margy’s as well as body treatments spanning relaxation massages, toning and slimming using the latest LPG technique.
During her visit, Mrs. Lombard explained the importance of a regular regimen for the skin using Margy’s brand that she describes as being ‘a comprehensive response to all skin aging’. “Remember, Margy said,‘at twenty we determine the skin we will have at forty, at thirty we determine the skin we will have at fifty, at forty we determine the skin we have at sixty and so on… Genetics play very little part in skin ageing. What matters more is our lifestyle and the way we treat our skin!”
Margy’s range of products is simple and straightforward, being based on the biomimetic properties of the skin’s active compounds, which helps to target the origin of skin degradation and inflammation in order to reduce it.Mr. George Demitry, general manager of the hotel said in his welcome address: “We are very happy today to welcome Mrs. Lombard at Royal Rose and very proud to have landed the exclusive use of her wonderful brand. Alba Spa is the perfect match for such an internationally acclaimed label and we are sure that clients will find here a wonderful beauty haven while getting the utmost in rejuvenation and relaxation treatments.”
Source:-Alba Spa
